rooms.name: Entrance & Reception Area
rooms.description: Provides a welcoming open space with minimalistic design and natural lighting. Vastu-aligned entrance facing North to harness positive energy.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: Modern living area integrated with the dining area. Windows are strategically placed on the eastern and northern sides for natural light and Vastu compliance.

rooms.name: Kitchenette
rooms.description: Compact kitchen designed to maximize efficiency in a limited space. Features modern appliances with an emphasis on sustainability. Located adjacent to the living area for ease of access.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Functional bathroom incorporating minimalist design and natural ventilation. Placed in the southwest corner to adhere to Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office space with a quiet ambiance, designed for productivity and privacy. Windows oriented towards east for natural morning light.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom. Oriented towards the east for optimal morning light, in accordance with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Secondary Bedrooms
rooms.description: One or two smaller bedrooms designed to meet the requirements of an irregular plot. Placed on the southwestern side for balance and calm energy.

rooms.name: Storage / Utility Room
rooms.description: Compact utility room for storage and additional functionalities. Optimized placement to maintain a clutter-free living space.
